c74object.name: abc.pict2map
c74object.digest: Abclib's Graphic 2D control of a source position
c74object.description: abc.pict2map is an abstraction inside a bpatcher that enables to graphically control the abc.hoa.map~ object. There are no default values. It generates the polar coordinates of the source r and theta (in radians).

method.name: reset
method.description: when sended to the left inlet sets the initial value (x=0, y=0).
method.digest: when sended to the left inlet sets the initial value

method.name: float
method.description: when sended to the left inlet sets the x value.
method.digest: when sended to the left inlet sets the x value

method.name: float
method.description: when sended to the right inlet sets the y value.
method.digest: when sended to the right inlet sets the y value
